channel.description: Recent content in project on WY Computer Science

item.title: Art Project
item.description: Deadline: Turn in by Friday, September 27. Produce: One complex piece of art per person. Goal: Art projects should demonstrate a range of functions from the chapter, try to use 3-4 from each category in your whole project. Methods of placement: beside, above, overlay, place-image, as well as the “/align” variations. (Use the variations!) Changing pictures: crop, scale, rotate. Shapes: triangles (many!), lots more listed at the end of Chapter 3 (PDF pages 60–61).

item.title: Connect Four
item.description: Familiarize yourself with the game of Connect Four, possibly playing a few games. Connect Four Overview Connect Four UI Connect Four Testcases Connect Four Spoilers Primer 2 Connect Four Rubric
